room_title: Escape room "TEG Unlocked: The Heist - Vol. 1: Chasing Hahn [DIGITAL]" by The Escape Game Philadelphia in Philadelphia
room_description: The Heist - Vol. 1: Chasing Hahn is a fully digital experience that you can play right at your house. All you need is an internet connection and a bit of wit! Use the digital evidence dossier and the online dashboard to track down an infamous art thief before another masterpiece goes missing. Your mission? Stop suspected art thief Vincent Hahn before another masterpiece goes missing! *This volume, “Chasing Hahn”, is a continuation of The Heist story, but you don’t need to play The Heist escape game first. The experience will be the same whether you’ve played The Heist or not. About TEG Unlocked: - TEG Unlocked is an adventure that you can play anywhere! - Once you receive your activation code, you will log in to the TEG Unlocked dashboard website to receive your mission. - You'll use what you find in digital zip folder and information on the web to progress through the adventure. - Find clues and solve puzzles to uncover the truth and complete your mission. - TEG Unlocked can be played by yourself or with a group of friends! You'll just need to be together in one place. Recommended for 1 - 4 players. - The game is not timed and if you get stuck, each adventure has a built in hint guide available at all times. Due to the challenging nature of the puzzles, TEG Unlocked is recommended for ages 12 and up, but is appropriate for all ages. Internet access is required to play.
